title: Extraordinary Motor-Themed City Escape in Munich with Unique Car Studios & Spa
description: Experience the thrill of Munich's automotive history with a unique stay combining driving culture with unparalleled comfort. Located within the city's Motorworld complex, the hotel displays an impressive collection of cars and offers unique studios where guests can park their beloved vehicle in a personal design garage. Admire views of the locomotive hall from the onsite Vitality Spa, or savour fresh Italian cuisine at Bacio della Mamma before exploring Munich's rich history and culture.
